name: Aron (NU'EST) Tumblr Dashboard
description:
Another theme for my lovlies~ This time, it's Aron from NU'EST~ 

Credit to rosemonburstmode.tumblr.com
Best works at at 1600 x 900 screen orientation and higher. 
Lower orientations may have parts of the photo hidden behind their dashboard

Also, Aron logo is not mine, it can be found here: 
http://userstyles.org/styles/63063/nu-est-s-aron-tumblr-logo
